queries.name: Churn - Customer Breakdown - Universal
queries.query:
SELECT canal, count(*) as users_count
	FROM main__build.retail_c360.churn_features  WHERE churn =1  and canal is not null GROUP BY canal

queries.name: Churn - Predicted to Churn - Universal
queries.query: SELECT user_id, churn from main__build.retail_c360.churn_users where churn=1

queries.name: Churn - Monthly Revenue Risk - Universal

query_draft.draft_text:
SELECT sum(amount)/100 as MRR_at_risk FROM main__build.retail_c360.churn_orders o WHERE month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss')) = 
      (select max(month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) from main__build.retail_c360.churn_orders) and user_id in (SELECT user_id FROM main__build.retail_c360.churn_users WHERE churn=1);
query_draft.original_query_text:
SELECT sum(amount)/100 as MRR_at_risk FROM dbdemos.retail_c360.churn_orders o WHERE month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss')) = 
      (select max(month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) from dbdemos.retail_c360.churn_orders) and user_id in (SELECT user_id FROM dbdemos.retail_c360.churn_users WHERE churn=1);

queries.query:
SELECT sum(amount)/100 as MRR_at_risk FROM main__build.retail_c360.churn_orders o WHERE month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss')) = 
      (select max(month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) from main__build.retail_c360.churn_orders) and user_id in (SELECT user_id FROM main__build.retail_c360.churn_users WHERE churn=1);

queries.name: Churn - Predicted Churn Percent Payment Method - Universal
queries.query:
-- select * from main__build.retail_c360.churn_features;

SELECT p.country, p.churn, count(*) as customers
	FROM main__build.retail_c360.churn_features p
	GROUP BY p.country, p.churn

queries.name: Churn - Predictions - Universal

query_draft.draft_text:
SELECT cast(days_since_creation/30 as int) as days_since_creation, churn, count(*) as customers
   FROM main__build.retail_c360.churn_features
   GROUP BY days_since_creation, churn having days_since_creation < 1000
query_draft.original_query_text:
SELECT cast(days_since_creation/30 as int) as days_since_creation, churn, count(*) as customers
   FROM dbdemos.retail_c360.churn_features
   GROUP BY days_since_creation, churn having days_since_creation < 1000

queries.query:
SELECT cast(days_since_creation/30 as int) as days_since_creation, churn, count(*) as customers
   FROM main__build.retail_c360.churn_features
   GROUP BY days_since_creation, churn having days_since_creation < 1000

queries.name: Churn - At-Risk Customers - Universal
queries.query: SELECT count(*)/12 as at_risk FROM main__build.retail_c360.churn_users WHERE churn=1

queries.name: Churn - Total MRR - Universal

query_draft.draft_text:
SELECT sum(amount)/10 as MRR FROM main__build.retail_c360.churn_orders o WHERE month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss')) = 
      (select max(month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) from main__build.retail_c360.churn_orders);
query_draft.original_query_text:
SELECT sum(amount)/10 as MRR FROM dbdemos.retail_c360.churn_orders o WHERE month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss')) = 
      (select max(month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) from dbdemos.retail_c360.churn_orders);

queries.query:
SELECT sum(amount)/10 as MRR FROM main__build.retail_c360.churn_orders o WHERE month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss')) = 
      (select max(month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) from main__build.retail_c360.churn_orders);

queries.name: Churn - Subscriptions based on Internet Service

query_draft.draft_text:
select platform, churn, count(*) as event_count from main__build.retail_c360.churn_app_events 
    inner join main__build.retail_c360.churn_users using (user_id) 
    where platform is not null
    group by platform, churn
query_draft.original_query_text:
select platform, churn, count(*) as event_count from main__build.retail_c360.churn_app_events inner join dbdemos.retail_c360.churn_users using (user_id) where platform is not null
group by platform, churn

queries.query:
select platform, churn, count(*) as event_count from main__build.retail_c360.churn_app_events 
    inner join main__build.retail_c360.churn_users using (user_id) 
    where platform is not null
    group by platform, churn
